Methodologies: Quantitative measurement of glucose via electrical current detection
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACCU-CHEK Aviva Test Strips for use with ACCU-CHEK Aviva meter to quantitatively measure glucose in whole blood specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood for monitoring glucose in home or health care facilities; suitable for capillary, venous, arterial, and neonatal samples in professional use and capillary whole blood in home use.
